channel.title: Elite MC! [No-Griefing][Survival][No-Whitelist][Anti-Griefing]
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][font=comic sans ms]Elite MC[/font][/size]
[size=24pt][font=trebuchet ms][u][b][i]Gamerz, Ready for action![/i][/b][/u][/font][/size]
[font=verdana][size=24pt]Ip:[/size][/font] [size=14pt]minecraft.elitegaming.co.za[/size]
We are a new Minecraft server, looking for a fun and friendly crowed. The server officially went live on the 23rd of July.
Our minecraft server is all about Survival! We have two worlds, excluding the end and the nether. One being Survival where the difficulty is set to Hard, the other world being the Normal world, the difficulty is set to Peaceful.
We have a total of 25 plugins, one of them being permissions. [/center] [font=comic sans ms][size=36pt][u][b][i]Rules:[/i][/b][/u][/size][/font]
No Griefing
No Trespassing on other peoples property
No Hacking (Xray-textures, Zombe Mod or any third-party software)
Do not disrespect staff
Do not swear or use foul language
Do not argue with players, either '/m <player>' ingame or take it to the forums(Site not finished yet)
Do not beg staff to spawn items
Do not look in chests without permissions
No Spamming
No Stealing
No Racism or talk about any sexually related topics
So join today!
